member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER
member.summary: Describes the filtered list of property descriptions that is returned.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_ALL
member.summary: The list contains all property descriptions in the system.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_SYSTEM
member.summary: The list contains system property descriptions only. It excludes third-party property descriptions that are registered on the computer.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_NONSYSTEM
member.summary: The list contains only third-party property descriptions that are registered on the computer.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_VIEWABLE
member.summary: The list contains only viewable properties, where <typeInfo isViewable="true">.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_QUERYABLE
member.summary: Deprecated in Windows 7 and later. The list contains only queryable properties, where <typeInfo isViewable="true" isQueryable="true">.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_INFULLTEXTQUERY
member.summary: Deprecated in Windows 7 and later. The list contains only properties to be included in full-text queries.

member.name: PROPDESC_ENUMFILTER.PDEF_COLUMN
member.summary: The list contains only properties that are columns.
